clinical_study.brief_title: Aesthetic and Functional Outcomes of Eyelid Reconstruction After Excision of Periocular Tumors
clinical_study.official_title: Aesthetic and Functional Outcomes of Eyelid Reconstruction After Excision of Periocular Tumors

brief_summary.textblock:
- To determine the aesthetic and functional outcomes of different techniques used in eyelid reconstruction following periocular defects.
- To determine the complications of eyelid reconstruction and how to prevent them

detailed_description.textblock:
Patients will undergo the following :
Direct eyelid closure will be done in small defects with or without canthyolysis Larger defects will be reconstructed with anterior and posterior lamella reconstruction using grafts and flaps
Patients will be followed up as regard
- The stability of flap or graft
- The vertical and horizontal measurements of palbepral fissure
- Detection of any complications
- Donor site follow up
- Patient degree of satisfaction

primary_outcome.description: Assessment of flap or graft as regard the function , stability and colour match

primary_outcome.measure: Measurement of vertical and horizontal diameters of the palbepral fissure
primary_outcome.description: Measurement of the length between the inner and outer canthus by ruler to determine the horizontal diameter of the palbepral fissure , and measurement of the distance between upper and lower lid margins at the pupil center to determine the vertical palbepral fissure diameter

arm_group.description: Direct eyelid closure will be done in small defects after periocular defects with or without canthyolysis , Larger defects will be reconstructed with anterior and posterior lamella reconstruction using grafts and flaps

intervention.description: Assessment of differrent techniques in anterior and posterior lamella reconstruction after periocular defects

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Patients with periocular tumors and candidate for excision
Exclusion Criteria:
- patients with history of radiotherapy or chemotherapy

patient_data.ipd_description: The Functional and cosmetic outcomes of differrent methods of eye lid reconstruction
